case.title: A simple man with a simple dream - 28 (London)
case.text: Thanks a lot to open my ad.I appreciate that.May be you are missing something in life,that's why,you are here like me.Now here is my story.This is Tanzir,28 years old man from central London.I know you will describe me as a cute,sweet,normal,simple,reliable,caring and fun loving man.I am single and never married.Still looking for some special and unforgettable moments in life.I am very clean and love clean as well.My mail is tanzir786 at yahoo dot com.My number is o seven eight seven five five nine six eight eight nine.Please no gay people please and no private number.Hope to hear from you very soon.Anyway I am alone here,no family here and I got a very few friends.So would love to be someone's friend too.Look after yourself dear until i am with you.
